testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Looks like you didn't print the final result!
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Write how many cups of coffee you will need: > 300 For 300 cups of coffee you will need: 60000 ml of water 15000 ml of milk 4500 g of coffee beans
